resources.string: This app is a production of Oulu University of Applied Sciences, which is created in order to calculate approximate consumption of gasoline when driving a car. It can also search a given address in a given town, and the app marks the given address.
Do not use this app to navigate while driving a car!
This is meant to only use when you want to measure gasoline consuming.
Write city and address to search
Try to write a valid location..
